title: EU requests info from YouTube, Snapchat, TikTok on content algorithms
description: The commission said it had requested additional information from TikTok about measures the firm had adopted to keep bad actors from manipulating the application and to reduce risks related to elections and civic discourse. The tech firms must provide the requested information by November 15, the EU said, after which the commission will decide on next steps, which could include fines.
content: The EU Commission requested information on Wednesday from YouTube, Snapchat and TikTok on the parameters used by their algorithms to recommend content to users and their role in amplifying some systemic risks, including those related to the electoral process, mental health and protection of minors.
